alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 4:56PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN ST. LOUIS COUNTY THROUGH 515 PM CDT... At 454 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area, or 17 miles northwest of Cloquet, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Hail may fall onto US Highway 2 near and east of Gowan over the next twenty minutes. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern St. Louis County, including the following locations... Gowan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
